channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Alien ocean could hide signs of life from spacecraft

item.title: Air pollution clouds the mind and makes everyday tasks challenging

item.title: Dusting for stars' magnetic fingerprints
item.description: Astronomers have succeeded in observing the magnetic field around a young star where planets are thought to be forming. The team was able to use dust ...

item.title: Largest radio jet ever seen in the early universe
item.description: Astronomers have characterized the largest-ever early-Universe radio jet. Historically, such large radio jets have remained elusive in the distant Uni...

item.title: Scientists discover brain mechanism that helps us overcome fear
item.description: Researchers have unveiled the precise brain mechanisms that enable animals to overcome instinctive fears. The study in mice could have implications fo...
